Jean Mercanton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean_Mercanton 0 Jean Mercanton (May 20, 1920 – November 4, 1947) was a French film actor. Mercanton began his career as a child actor at a very early age, making his film debut in the year of his birth. Jean_Mercanton ( May_20_,_1920 – November_4_,_1947 ) was a_French_film_actor . Mercanton began his_career as a_child_actor at a_very_early_age , making his_film_debut in the_year of his_birth .
